Friggin terrible... translations are epic bull. Waste of time do not watch Instantz' release... esp. One Piece!!
They have quick releases and the subs grammar/spelling is good.
They're very quick to get episodes out.  The grammar isn't always perfect but it's getting better plus the speed is amazing.
no good

Speed and Quality.  First to release a fansub as of 2008, they have the HD version out before SD.
They are fast and very detailed, overall they do amazing work and I´m happy they do it.

I don't know Japanese but from the way some sentences are worded, even I can tell something's wrong with their translation. Video quality's average too. Unfortunately it's the only group I can find of the Thriller Bark arc as of mid 2010
